subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[bow]] one's [[head]]
# to [[bend down]]; to [[bow]]
# to [[look]] from [[above]]; to [[overlook]]; to [[look down]]
# {{lb|zh|honorific}} to [[deign]]
